name: Songlink (Odesli)
description: Smart music links for Mattermost. Slash command and auto-unfurl using Odesli (song.link).

settings_schema.header: Configure how Songlink behaves in your workspace.
settings_schema.footer: Songlink uses the public Odesli API (api.song.link) and does not require an API key.

settings.help_text: When enabled, posts containing supported music links will automatically get a smart link preview from the bot.
Two-letter country code (e.g., US, GB, DE) to localize platform availability.
